      • sendSms

        public static void sendSms(java.lang.String destination,
                           java.lang.String message)
        Method to send sms (without observing when it will get sent or delivered)
        Parameters:
        destination - Phone number of recepient
        message - Text to send

      • sendSms

        public static int sendSms(java.lang.String destination,
                          java.lang.String message,
                          java.lang.Class<? extends Service> serviceClass,
                          Context ctx)
        Method to send SMS if you want to observe for when the sms gets send and delivered
        Parameters:
        destination - Phone number of recepient
        message - Text to send
        serviceClass - The service to which an intent will be sent when message is sent and delivered
        ctx - Context using which the target service will be started
